entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of showers after midnight. Showers beginning overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 17.
entry.summary: Showers ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 17. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
